Message.Title: Retrace 2-3% this week-still a buy
Message.Msg: looking for $ 1.00 to $ 1.50 retrace from last weeks high point----to regain buy point--general market looks top heavy and any drop will cause e-bay to drop 2-3% am a buyer at $ 47.50 to $ 48.10

Message.Title: I might move to China to become a more sucessful Ebay seller
Message.Msg: there are thousands of listings for under $2.50 buy it now coming from China.. This means that they are getting better deals on fees and shipping than sellers in the USA who must pay at least $1.65 shipping $.30 Paypal fee + 13 % of FV...
